name: Mesa Grill Potato Salad
recipeIngredient: 1 tablespoon puréed canned chipotles. (To make chipotle purée, process canned chipotles in a blender or a food processor, along with a little of their liquid.)
2 green onions (white bulb and 3 inches of green), finely chopped
Kosher salt and freshly ground pepper

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pot of boiling salted water over high heat, boil the potatoes until cooked through, 12 to 15 minutes. Drain and slice 1/2 inch thick.
In a medium bowl, combine the mayonnaise, mustard, chipotle puree, lime juice, green and red onions, jalapeño, garlic, cilantro, cayenne, salt, and pepper.
Place the warm potatoes in a large bowl and pour the mixture over them. Mix well and season to taste with additional salt and pepper.
